title: Need a little help with this Typeface â€¦
content:
Hi, is anybody out there who can indetify the font in the image attached??

Many thanks

| --- | --- |
| [font.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20101014183116/http:/typophile.com/files/font_7.gif) | 28.93 KB |
author: werk

comments.content:
Well, the font from 'Corel' is called "brochure", you can actually  
get it here 'http://www.musicaecomputer.com/fonts/brochure/italiano.htm'  
but if you're interested in the original name (they may have renamed it) you'd have to ask again, and someone else might know (by original name, I mean what it was called when it first came out from the foundry and before Corel renamed it, if they did, that is, though I'm not sure about that)
It's an old film font called Book Jacket Italic, released in 1972 by VGC.
